A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: First let me say that I really enjoyed the music\, visual effects\, and Mark Hamill's performance was great even though I didn't like what they did with Luke Skywalker. That being said this was a bad \"Star Wars\" movie. The amount of plot holes and lack of logic like dropping bombs similar to a WWII bomber in space when there's no gravity in space or the subplot with Finn and Rose that was completely unnecessary. This movie was a mess. Completely took everything JJ set up in the Force Awakens and ruined it. I saw this movie twice. I thought that my opinion was wrong the first time I saw it and I tried to give it the benefit of the doubt and I even waited 2 months to do my review in order to think and soak in what I saw. My official opinion is that this Star Wars movie is garbage. I created a list of all the things wrong with this movie and there's 33 things wrong with it. 33. Bottom line this is a horrible movie and I expected more. Also says something when the actors in the movie don't like the movie.
